examples:
What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: The design will not save, and the link to edit does not work. When clicked it says currently unable to open that document

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe the problem: The gif link is not saved What is the type of problem ?: Downloading

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: How do i save a file with an active link
What is the type of problem ?: saving Describe the problem: I am unable to save the linked document

Describe your issue: Open Canva with the link, but saving process has been errored. We can not continue our editing also,

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: I've been finding it difficult to save my design, and the link to my design is empty, clicking the link only brings me back to the homepage, this is really tiring

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: When I save my design my link doesn't work
What is the type of problem ?: saving Describe the problem: I can't click on the links I added to the project

Describe your issue: Hello, I would like to ask why the link I add to the sentence does not take effect after the picture saved? What picture’s format should I save the link can take effect?

What kind of problem?: Saving

What kind of problem ?: Save Describe the problem: Dear Sir or Madam, I have already carried out the steps you recommended without success. Nevertheless, I cannot save my design as a PowerPoint presentation. Here is the link to my design<URL> I hope you can help me. Thank you and best regards, <NAME>

What kind of problem?: Saving

My document with the link below is returning an error. I can't edit, save, or download it. 

Please help.

Link to document:
<URL>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: The embedded link in my design doesn't save, is not usable in FB post.  Am I saving it wrong?

What kind of problem?: Downloading

Describe your issue: I cannot download and save my new work. It keeps on going back to my old work on the project to save. It is also telling me I have a link in my work and I have over 350 images. I do not. Please help.

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: I am trying to save the following link to my account and I cannot. Can you help? 

<URL>

Describe your issue: The link isn't saving. When I save the work my embedded link isn't saving to my work

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: Can I save my recorded presentation? Or can I only use a link? My course platform does not allow links, only uploads.

What kind of problem?: Downloading

Describe your issue: when i click a link that was provided to me to edit, it says "we couldn't save your design"
an error has occurred 
what should i do?
What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: When saving a website by clicking on the link, the message “quit canva” appears simulating an error page. How can I solve this?

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: I completed the invitation to my art show.   I do not know how to get a link to send out?  thks!

What kind of problem is it ?: How to save Describe the problem: We tried to save your design for 60 seconds, but it was not possible. Possibly this is due to the error above: Did someone say '' obsession with links in media '' '? Your design has 101 media links which exceed the 101 media link limit. You have to use less than 100 to be able to save your design.

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: While editing, I added a link to my design. When I save the PNG file as recommended, the link is dead. How do I save a design to keep the link intact?

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: 100% linked Thank you so much ❤ ❤❤❤
What is your problem ?: Saving Describe the problem: Hello! I left the site without saving, and my presentation is no longer in my designs. can it be restored if it is available via the link<URL>
What kind of problem ?: Saving in progress Describe your problem: Hello I tried to do tt what you told me but the problem remains I am attaching photos and links<URL>
What kind of problem is it ?: How to save Describe the problem: how do I save it to pdf to use a link added on the card
What is the type of problem ?: saving Describe the problem: The link I add to an item does not work in the final exported file

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: I have links in the image, and the links aren't saving

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: I have updated a link in my document many times and it is still not saving and downloading properly. I have tried contacting and have not received an answer

What is your problem with ?: Submitting or posting Describe your problem: Hello! Links for editing stopped working. The error “cannot open the document at the moment. Go back to the page with your designs and try again. " I tried to return to the page with designs, copied the link and etc. again, but it did not help
What is the type of problem ?: saving Describe the problem: Save the information on the mini site, but append a link does not scroll down, I wonder why ???

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello, 
I received a link that I can only copy but am unable to save onto my account or open through it. can I please get help? Here is the presentation via link- 
<URL>
What type of problem?: Other Describe your problem: I cannot find the presentation corresponding to this link:<URL> It is not in my design or in my basket. thank you for helping me

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: This is my second report the closer I get to 100 pages everything is freezing, there is a reload link that keeps coming up. I click the link and nothing, this is frustrating and it is causing me hours of time I do not have. This is delaying my projects for work.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I had trouble with a design reverting back to the original template. I emailed around the 6th of January and was by the 22nd of January given links to my supposed designs. Trusted that they were correct and that was that. Here I am, a few weeks later trying to access those design links from the email, which are my resume, kinda important, and find out that they link to some random generic orange design that I have never used in my life. So could someone please please please help me resurrect my resume and why is it that my cover letter design has saved perfectly well but the resume is what is missing. Links below to explain... Link to my design (resume) which is actually just a link to the original template with no editing: <URL>

The two links I was given that were apparently from the version history of the above link I'd given...
<URL>
<URL>

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: Status has been "Saving paused" for some time now. Can't download as mp4. When I share the presentation with someone else via link, it shows an old version of the slideshow.

What kind of problem?: Downloading

Describe your issue: Hello! I embedded a you tube link into my design, but when I download the design the link does not work. How can I get the you tube video to play outside of Canva. What file type should it be saved as?
What kind of problem ?: Sharing Description of your problem: I sent it via the link, but the wrong edit image appeared while it was not completed.

Describe your issue: I can't insert a link to another website.  When I attempt, the box comes  up, I put the link in and it just disappears.

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: hi, how can I download a video of a voiced over presentation rather than just a link url.

Describe your issue: I keep on receiving the notification, "We Couldn't Save Your Design." I am given two options. No matter if I select one or the other, I cannot access the editor for my design. Here is a link to it:

<URL>

Describe your issue: When I make the text "toadbuilds.com" a link the letter U won't underline. Plus, I can't add a screenshot on this "report an issue with canva."

Describe your issue: The downloaded versions of the work that we have included a link to are not incorporated into the final design. The link does not work

What kind of problem?: Downloading

Describe your issue: When I click "Publish as website" I am not able to click the "open website" link as it is greyed out. Please help.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I changed my Password at your request. After changing my Password, when I went to my "All My Designs" link, it was empty. Your "Help" link suggests I go to the "Trash" link and put them back. However, the "Trash" folder is also empty. I need all my designs. Where are they and how do I get them back???
What kind of problem ?: Miscellaneous Describe the problem: Linking with FB is not allowed
What type of problem ?: Other Describe your problem: Hello, there is an offset white line in presentation web link mode with what is displayed in edit mode.
